Package com.redis.foundation.io

Class DataGridLogger

java.lang.Object
com.redis.foundation.io.DataGridLogger
public class DataGridLogger extends Object
This class offers convenience methods for logging data grid information.

      public void setFormattedFlag(boolean aIsFormatted)
